author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Foshan Haitian Flavouring and Food to pay A shares div for FY 2017 on April 26
text:
April 20 (Reuters) - Foshan Haitian Flavouring and Food Co Ltd :
* Says it will pay cash dividend of 0.85 yuan(before tax)/share for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 25
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-dividend on April 26 and the dividend will be paid on April 26
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/9myBt6
